name: react-redux-boiler
description: A boiler plate for A&D react-redux clients, complete with auth logic

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run spec
scripts.framework: yarn add axios classnames history immutable prop-types pubsub-js react react-dom react-redux react-router react-router-dom react-router-redux@next react-violet-forms redux redux-devtools redux-devtools-dock-monitor redux-devtools-log-monitor redux-form redux-resolver redux-thunk validate-this
scripts.tools: yarn add prompt axios-mock-adapter babel-cli babel-core babel-eslint babel-loader babel-plugin-module-resolver babel-preset-es2015 babel-preset-react babel-preset-stage-0 browser-sync browser-sync-webpack-plugin css-loader enzyme eslint eslint-config-airbnb@15.1.0 eslint-import-resolver-babel-module eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y@5.1.1 eslint-plugin-react expect extract-text-webpack-plugin html-webpack-plugin jsdom mocha node-localstorage node-sass react-addons-test-utils redux-mock-store sass-loader style-loader webpack webpack-dev-server --dev
scripts.configure: rm -r node_modules/ || true && yarn run tools && yarn run framework
scripts.fresh: yarn run configure && yarn run set-variables && yarn start

author: Sam Slotsky (Ackmann & Dickenson)
